section1.title: 1. Data Collection
section1.content: InstaDownloader does not collect or store any personal information from its users. We do not require accounts, email addresses, or any form of registration to use our Instagram downloader tool.

section2.title: 2. Log Files
section2.content: Like many other websites, we may collect non-personally identifiable information that your browser sends whenever you visit our service. This may include your IP address, browser type, and the pages you visit.

section3.title: 3. Cookies
section3.content: We may use cookies to improve your user experience, such as remembering your theme preferences. You can choose to disable cookies through your individual browser options.
